pages.text: $(li)The Cage is a block that allows you to trap small creatures inside, transport them easily or even place them on the ground as decoration purposes.
$(li)To capture a new creature you have to right click a creature while you are holding an empty Cage in your hand.
$(li)You can place the cage like other common block shift right clicking while you are holding the Cage in the desired place to show your trapped creature.
$(li)Right click while you are holding the cage with the trapped creature inside and you are pointing to a block to release it.
